content: are happy with border join the border colour to corner space round 1 1ch * 1dc 2ch 1dc in corner space 3ch 1dc in next space 3ch along side to next corner * repeat from * to * around the blanket edge to the start space slip_stitch into top of 1st double_crochet of round round 2 slip_stitch to corner space 1ch *3dc in corner space 1dc in double_crochet 3dc in chain space 1dc in double_crochet along side to next corner * repeat from * to * around the blanket edge to the start space slip_stitch into top of 1st double_crochet of round ✽ also see useful pictures on page 6 for help with the next round round 3 slip_stitch to next double_crochet middle of 3 corner double_crochet s 4ch counts as 1tr 1ch 1tr 1ch twice in same st **skip 1 1dc in next *1ch skip 3 1tr 1ch 3 times in next skip 3 1dc in next * repeat from * to * along the side of the blanket up to 3 corner double_crochet s skip 1 1tr 1ch 3 times in middle st of 3 corner double_crochet s ** repeat from ** to ** around blanket edge to starting corner then skip 1 slip_stitch into 3rd chain of starting 4ch round 4 slip_stitch into space 4ch counts as 1tr 1ch 1tr in same space 1tr in treble_crochet 1tr 1ch 1tr in next space *1ch skip treble_crochet and space 1dc in double_crochet 1ch skip chain and treble_crochet 1tr 1ch 1tr in space 1tr in treble_crochet 1tr 1ch 1tr in space * repeat from * to * around blanket edge until last double_crochet has been worked then 1ch skip space and treble_crochet slip_stitch into 3rd chain of starting 4ch break yarn a sandra paul/cherry heart original design ©
